sentence: Let's show them we're NOT backing down: https://t.co/4OXYM6kWP5 pic.twitter.com/o6xQ538lJz Mandela Barnes (@TheOtherMandela) December 20, 2021
title: The way forward is to view Manchin and Sinema as opportunities not just as obstacles

sentence: In Wisconsin, Republican Senator Ron Johnson is running for reelection and is being challenged by Mandela Barnes, the lieutenant governor of Wisconsin, who would be the state's first Black senator.
title: This week on The Brief | 'Democracy is on the line' in 2022: Key elections and filibuster reform
